name: Symbiosis
description: Among those brought to the present via anomaly crisis are joined Trill, future hosts, and symbionts. This surplus in symbionts has led to abductions and other moral quandaries. Rescue the symbionts and help the Trill find a long-term solution.
rules:
-- There are two Phases to this Event! Each Phase is individually timed.
-- In this Hybrid Event, you will complete Ship Battles in one Phase, and Federation, Augments or Borg Faction Missions in another Phase.
-- Unique Ship Battles and Faction Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using any version of Dax or crew with the Trill trait will provide a bonus to Ship Battles and Faction Missions.
-- Using the H.M.S. Bounty, the Karemma Ship, or the Klingon K'Vort Bird-of-Prey will provide a hull bonus in Skirmish Battles.
-- Every Ship Battle or Faction Mission you complete earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Dax or Trill crew
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: Bashir
featured_crew.flavor: Working for Incredible Tales magazine Julius Eaton wrote about the future and the technologies it might bring.

featured_crew.name: Y. Dax
featured_crew.flavor: Yedrin is a descendant of Jadzia and current host of the Dax symbiont, who also bears the guilt of his ancestor's mistake.

action.name: What are you going to do about it?

featured_crew.name: J. Dax
featured_crew.flavor: Honoring an oath made by Curzon, Jadzia avenged the sons of Kang, Koloth, and Kor.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Pav
rewards.flavor: The leader of the Trill government, Pav was conflicted about Adira’s joining with Tal.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

ship.name: Klingon K'Vort Bird-of-Prey
ship.flavor: A versatile craft often used for scouting and patrolling. The K'Vort-class is the most stable iteration of this design.

ship.name: H.M.S. Bounty
ship.flavor: A Klingon bird-of-prey commandeered by Admiral James T. Kirk. Ironically named Bounty by CMO Leonard "Bones" McCoy.

ship.name: Karemma Ship
ship.flavor: A vessel used by the Karemma, a Gamma Quadrant species and part of the Dominion. Equipped with unique defense and attack systems.

rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Bashir
rewards.flavor: Working for Incredible Tales magazine Julius Eaton wrote about the future and the technologies it might bring.

rewards.name: J. Dax
rewards.flavor: Honoring an oath made by Curzon, Jadzia avenged the sons of Kang, Koloth, and Kor.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

content.reroll_info:
Skirmish rewards are additive. By continuously rolling you receive additional rewards. No rewards are lost by rolling again.
DROP RATES:
Event VP: 13.58%
Time Portal Pack: 0.13%
Chronitons: 11.45%
Honor: 14.11%
Intel: 27.43%
Credits: 33.29%

goals.flavor: Advocate for a new method with the Augments.

screens.text: "Hello? I'm so thankful someone answered my hail. I don't have much time. I awoke aboard this ship and overheard my captors talking about wanting to remove the symbiont from my body. I'm sending coordinates, please hurry!"

"Sounds like another in a long line of Trill abductions. Cowards, ripping the symbionts of future hosts right out of 'em! Better find Yedrin fast, Captain, before they kill him and we end up with something horrible, like a Ferengi Dax!"
